result.eng: I feel that something is not right.
result.ga: braithim go bhfuil rud éigin as bealach
result.orig: braithim go bhfuil rud éigin as bealach
result.html: braithim go bhfuil rud éigin as bealachI feel that something is not right.
result.ponchtml: braiṫim go ḃfuil rud éigin as bealaċI feel that something is not right.

result.eng: I feel that it is a cause for concern.
result.ga: is ábhar imní dhom é
result.orig: is ábhar imní dhom é
result.html: is ábhar imní dhom éI feel that it is a cause for concern.
result.ponchtml: is áḃar imní ḋom éI feel that it is a cause for concern.

result.eng: Whenever you feel like helping us, you will be welcome.
result.ga: má bhíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beidh fáilte romhat
result.orig: má bhíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beidh fáilte romhat
result.html: má bhíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beidh fáilte romhatWhenever you feel like helping us, you will be welcome.
result.ponchtml: má ḃíon fonn ort cuidiú linn beiḋ fáilte roṁatWhenever you feel like helping us, you will be welcome.

result.html: tá fuacht ormI feel cold.
result.ponchtml: tá fuaċt ormI feel cold.

result.eng: Well, I hope that you will feel better soon.
result.ga: bhuel tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luath
result.orig: bhuel tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luath
result.html: bhuel tá súil agam go mbeidh biseach ort go luathWell, I hope that you will feel better soon.
result.ponchtml: ḃuel tá súil agam go mbeiḋ biseaċ ort go luaṫWell, I hope that you will feel better soon.

result.eng: They will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ga: ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.orig: ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.html: ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ponchtml: ní ċreidfiḋ siad a ḋaṫ mura moṫaí siad lena láṁa é agus mura ḃfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
